item.description: Meel Group Welcome to the Meel Group’s web page. We are situated at National University of Singapore.

item.title: Publications
News
item.description: 20 June 2018 I will be at IJCAI from July 12 â€“ July 19 and at Leiden University on July 20. I will be co-presenting tutorial with Supratik Chakraborty at IJCAI on July 13. # -- 13 August 2018 There will be a weekly group seminar every Monday at 4pm in MR5 at SOC(NUS), starting from Aug 13. Rahul Gupta will present his work in the first such session. Slides will be uploaded soon after the session.

item.title: People
Contact
item.description: Kuldeep S. Meel Assistant Professor Computer Science Department, School of Computing National University of Singapore Please consult my calendar before suggesting a meeting time.

item.title: Openings
item.description: We are looking for highly motivated Ph.D. students, postdocs, and interns (with time commitment of at least 6 months) in our group. If you are a student at NUS, feel free to drop by Kuldeep’s office or schedule a meeting with him. (See his calendar). Otherwise, please send him an email with your CV if you are interested. If you are looking for an internship/postdoc, make sure your subject contains the word “olleh” and you should include reviews of two of our group’s papers (published in the previous 3 years).
